data.yamlPipeline:
pipeline:
  name: testPipeline_Cypress
  identifier: testPipeline_Cypress
  projectIdentifier: Satyam_Onboarding
  orgIdentifier: default
  tags: {}
  stages:
    - stage:
        name: stage1
        identifier: stage1
        description: ""
        type: Deployment
        spec:
          deploymentType: Kubernetes
          environment:
            environmentRef: dev
            deployToAll: false
            infrastructureDefinitions:
              - identifier: env1
          execution:
            steps:
              - step:
                  type: ShellScript
                  name: dyz
                  identifier: dyz
                  spec:
                    shell: Bash
                    onDelegate: true
                    source:
                      type: Inline
                      spec:
                        script: echo 1
                    environmentVariables: []
                    outputVariables: []
                    delegateSelectors:
                      - <+org.identifier>
                  timeout: 10m
                  failureStrategies: []
                  when:
                    condition: "false"
                    stageStatus: Success
            rollbackSteps:
              - step:
                  type: ShellScript
                  name: ShellScript_3
                  identifier: ShellScript_2
                  timeout: 10m
                  spec:
                    shell: Bash
                    onDelegate: true
                    source:
                      type: Inline
                      spec:
                        script: echo 33
                    environmentVariables: []
                    outputVariables: []
          services:
            values: <+input>
            metadata:
              parallel: true
        tags: {}
        failureStrategies:
          - onFailure:
              errors:
                - AllErrors
              action:
                type: Retry
                spec:
                  retryCount: 2
                  retryIntervals:
                    - 10m
                  onRetryFailure:
                    action:
                      type: Abort
        when:
          pipelineStatus: All
          condition: "false"
    - stage:
        name: pipeline
        identifier: pipeline
        description: ""
        type: Pipeline
        spec:
          org: default
          pipeline: stagepropagation
          project: Satyam_Onboarding
          inputs:
            identifier: stagepropagation
            stages:
              - stage:
                  identifier: stage1
                  type: Deployment
                  spec:
                    service:
                      serviceRef: <+input>
                      serviceInputs: <+input>
                    environmentGroup:
                      environments:
                        - environmentRef: dev
                          infrastructureDefinitions:
                            - identifier: env1
                        - infrastructureDefinitions: <+input>
                          environmentRef: diffnevid
        when:
          condition: "false"
          pipelineStatus: All
    - stage:
        name: customStage
        identifier: customStage
        description: ""
        type: Custom
        spec:
          execution:
            steps:
              - step:
                  type: ShellScript
                  name: ShellScript_1
                  identifier: ShellScript_1
                  timeout: 10m
                  spec:
                    shell: Bash
                    onDelegate: true
                    source:
                      type: Inline
                      spec:
                        script: echo 1
                    environmentVariables: []
                    outputVariables: []
        tags: {}
        when:
          pipelineStatus: All
          condition: "false"
  variables:
    - name: path
      type: String
      description: ""
      value: library/nginx
